patthana18.27:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ
patthana18.27:1.1_1: āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ
patthana18.27:1.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo ca naaraṇo noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:1.1_3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.27:2.1: Saraṇaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.27:3.1: Araṇaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.27:4.1_0: Araṇaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:4.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Etena upāyena sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
